2025-08-07.content: To increase security, starting in March 2025, support for Transport Layer Security (TLS) version 1.1 and earlier is deprecated. [Update your application settings](https://cloud.google.com/appengine/docs/flexible/secure-minimum-tls) in the App Engine flexible environment to use TLS version 1.2 and later, along with a corresponding secure set of cipher suites (Preview).

summary.title: TLS Deprecation Update
summary.summary: Support for TLS 1.1 and earlier is deprecated starting March 2025. Update your application settings to use TLS 1.2 and later.

2025-06-17.content: Support for the [Ruby 3.4 runtime](https://cloud.google.com/appengine/docs/flexible/ruby/runtime) is in [General Availability (GA)](https://cloud.google.com/products/#product-launch-stages).

summary.title: Ruby 3.4 runtime now available
summary.summary: Ruby 3.4 runtime is now generally available for App Engine flexible environment.
